author: Special Correspondent
text:
You can now book online for prasadham from 17 temples associated with the Mahamaham festival in Kumbakonam.

Website

The Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments (HR&CE) Department has created a website – mahamaham2016.in — through which people in India can purchase online prasadham from 12 Saivaite temples and five Vaishnavaite temples. A website has been created for the Mahamaham festival that is held once in 12 years when Jupiter (Guru) enters Simha rasi (Leo). Masimaham is an annual event that occurs in the Tamil month of Masi (February–March) in the star of Maham. The Mahamaham is celebrated at the Mahamaham tank where it is believed that all the holy rivers meet. on this day at the appointed hour. Devotees take a dip along with the utsava idols of the deities.
title: Prasadham for Mahamaham can be booked online
